description: This file defines an Angular component 'FoliosListComponent' which displays a list of folios with options to create new ones, view details, and sort the list. It manages data fetching from the FolioService and presents it in a table format.

classes.name: FoliosListComponent
classes.description: An Angular component that displays and manages a list of folios for an analyst.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Initializes the component and loads the folios.

methods.name: onSort
methods.description: Handles sorting of the folios list based on selected column.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches the folios data from the FolioService.

methods.name: sort
methods.description: Sorts the folios array based on the current sort key.

ctags.name: Folio
ctags.pattern: /^    const key = this.sortKey as keyof Folio;$/

ctags.name: key
ctags.pattern: /^    const key = this.sortKey as keyof Folio;$/
